html: Just as the world’s righteous inhabitants have looked forward to a time when the earth assumes a paradisiacal glory and they can at last live in peace, so its prerequisite is the removal from the earth of those who are preventing it from coming to pass at the time wickedness reaches its apogee: “The Day of Jehovah will come as a cruel outburst of anger and wrath to make the earth a desolation, that sinners may be annihilated from it.... I have decreed calamity for the world, punishment for the wicked; I will put an end to the arrogance of insolent men and humble the pride of tyrants” (Isaiah 13:9, 11).
